source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
Set: The Hunt has a high chance to refresh its cooldown when you gain Luck of the Draw!

spells.description:
Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,538 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 986,532 Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Cinderbrew Stein

spells.description:
Equip: Occasionally share a drink with allies who assist you in combat, granting them 6,192 of their primary stat for 15 sec and absorbing 286,477 damage. You take a sip as well, granting 3,334 Agility and absorbing 1.4 million damage.

When you fall below 50% health, you take an emergency sip. This may only occur once every 1 min.

description: Watered down for consumption by lesser mortals.

spells.description: Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Crucible Raider's Corrupted Wingblades

spells.description: Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 295,897 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 82,194 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Crucible Raider's Corrupted Wingblades
